Module com.lmax.solana4j.client
Package com.lmax.solana4j.client.jsonrpc

Class SolanaJsonRpcClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.client.jsonrpc.SolanaJsonRpcClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SolanaApi
    public final class SolanaJsonRpcClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SolanaApi
    Implementation of the SolanaApi interface for interacting with the Solana blockchain via JSON-RPC. This client provides methods to perform various operations such as requesting airdrops, sending transactions, retrieving account information, and more.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SolanaJsonRpcClient​(java.net.http.HttpClient httpClient, java.lang.String rpcUrl)
      Constructs a new SolanaJsonRpcClient with the specified HTTP client and RPC URL.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SolanaJsonRpcClient

        public SolanaJsonRpcClient​(java.net.http.HttpClient httpClient,
                           java.lang.String rpcUrl)
        Constructs a new SolanaJsonRpcClient with the specified HTTP client and RPC URL.
        Parameters:
        httpClient - the HttpClient instance to use for sending requests. This allows customization of HTTP settings such as connection pooling, SSL context, and timeout configurations.
        rpcUrl - the URL of the Solana JSON-RPC node.

    • Method Detail

      • requestAirdrop

        public SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> requestAirdrop​(java.lang.String address,
                                                             long amountLamports)
                                                      throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Requests an airdrop of lamports to the specified address. This is used for test purposes to receive lamports (the smallest unit of SOL).
        Specified by:
        requestAirdrop in interface SolanaApi
        Parameters:
        address - the base58-encoded public key of the recipient account
        amountLamports - the amount of lamports to be airdropped
        Returns:
        the transaction signature as a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • sendTransaction

        public SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> sendTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionBlob)
                                                       throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Sends a transaction to the Solana blockchain without optional parameters.
        Specified by:
        sendTransaction in interface SolanaApi
        Parameters:
        transactionBlob - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        Returns:
        the signature of the transaction, which is a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • sendTransaction

        public SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> sendTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionBlob,
                                                              SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                       throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Sends a transaction to the Solana blockchain. The transaction is encoded as a base64-encoded string (transaction blob). Additional optional parameters can be passed to customize the transaction request.
        Specified by:
        sendTransaction in interface SolanaApi
        Parameters:
        transactionBlob - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the transaction request, such as `skipPreflight`, `preflightCommitment`, or other Solana JSON-RPC options
        Returns:
        the signature of the transaction, which is a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

                                                                       throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        size - the size of the account in bytes
        Returns:
        the minimum balance in lamports for rent exemption
        Throws:

        Specified by:
        minimumLedgerSlot in interface SolanaApi

        a SolanaClientResponse containing the minimum slot as a Long, or an error if the operation was unsuccessful.

      • getHealth

        public SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> getHealth()
                                                 throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Returns the current health of the node. A healthy node is one that is within HEALTH_CHECK_SLOT_DISTANCE slots of the latest cluster confirmed slot.
        Specified by:
        getHealth in interface SolanaApi
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the health status as a String. A response of "ok" typically indicates a healthy node.
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error in the JSON-RPC request or response.

        optionalParams - optional parameters for the query, such as limiting results or setting commitment levels.
        Returns:

        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if the request fails.

      • getTokenAccountsByOwner

        public SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<TokenAccount>> getTokenAccountsByOwner​(java.lang.String accountDelegate,
                                                                                  java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> filter)
                                                                           throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Retrieves token accounts owned by a specific address, filtered by criteria. Useful for finding SPL token accounts based on token mint or program ID.
        Specified by:
        getTokenAccountsByOwner in interface SolanaApi
        Parameters:
        accountDelegate - the base58-encoded public key of the account owner.
        filter - a key-value pair specifying the filter criteria (e.g., token mint or program ID).
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of TokenAccount objects.
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if the request fails.

      • getTokenAccountsByOwner

                                                                           throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException

        Specified by:

        optionalParams - optional parameters for the query.
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of TokenAccount objects.
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if the request fails.

                                                                             SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                                      throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Description copied from interface: SolanaApi
        Simulates a transaction without broadcasting it to the Solana blockchain, with optional parameters. This allows for additional customizations, such as setting the commitment level or enabling signature verification.
        Specified by:
        simulateTransaction in interface SolanaApi
        Parameters:
        transaction - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction.
        optionalParams - additional parameters for the simulation.
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a SimulateTransactionResponse object with the simulation results.
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if the request fails.
